head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DRIVER, WILLIAM ARTHUR

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DRIVER, WILLIAM ARTHUR

block.p: DRIVER-William Arthur. Age 74, of 40 East 10th St., NYC and Shipley, Yorkshire England. Stage actor and director in England and America. Creator and Head of the Bard Theatre of Drama and Dance, NY, for the last 41 years. Long-time friend and companion of John Psillakis. Beloved uncle of Alison, Andrew and Christopher Driver. On 13 July, 2000, at home. Funeral at the Church of the Ascension, 5th Avenue at 10 Street, Saturday, July 22, 1 PM, with burial to follow at Shipley, Yorkshire, England, at a later date.
